The writer Edgar Allan Poe (John Cusack) is on the hunt for a serial killer that mimics the crimes of his short stories and even kidnapped his girlfriend Emily (Alice Eve). To help in the investigation, Detective Emmett takes the case and intends to put an end to the grisly murders, which are followed riddles created by the criminal intelligence that challenges the author in a game of cat and mouse.
